thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Mohamed

author: Mohamed
title: Mohamed
text:
I've made a booking from Kuala Lumpur to Casablanca through Qatar airways after I finished the booking I've received an email from you informed me that I have a problem, with my credit card.I went to my bank I checked with them they confirm that everything was alright they asked me to make the booking front of them in that time I recognised that I have chosen the wrong flight I want to fly through Qatar airways, not Maroc airways soI changed the flight cause have anther choice available at end of my new booking I received an email from you advise me to not make any new booking that's what happened now I f you can approve my new booking I will be very pleased otherwise I don't the one with Qatar airways and Maroc airways I want the whole flight with Qatar airways do you understand what I mean I hope so.
Thanks
